chapters.title: Prologue:  Glimmers of the Pattern
chapters.info:
Bernaile Gelbarn,
      p. 48 (42)â€”Aes Sedai from Tarabon.  She was
      sent back to the Tower by the Aes Sedai in Salidar.  She keeps her hair
      done in many narrow, beaded braids, the style in Tarabon.
      See also
      Annharid;
      Celestin;
      Meidani.
